examples

Class AlphaMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • examples.AlphaMap

  • public class AlphaMap
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves to build an alpha (texture) map given heightmap data. The colors in an alpha map tell JME3 which textues to place and where. Without this, the map would be black.

      AlphaMap(HeightMap heightMap)

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlphaMap

        public AlphaMap(HeightMap heightMap)
        Parameters:
        heightMap - The heightMap for which to create an AlphaMap

    • Method Detail

      • writeImage

        public void writeImage()
        Creates the aplha map by painting colors on an image. Each color represents on texture to be panted on the terrain. Mixed colors represent blended textures. Try modifying this to see what you can do!

      • textureMap

        public com.jme3.texture.Texture2D textureMap()
        Returns:
        the created textureMap

      • vectors

        public ColorVector[][] vectors()
        Returns:
        THe COlorVector array that defines this map
